title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Man- Environment relationship; Positive and normative theories. Behavioural Science and modern movement, Substantive theory on Environment and human behaviour, SocialStimulation and interaction, the Affordances of the built environment, Gestalt theory of Perception- Cognition and Affect, Spatial behavior, Environmental Determinism, Environmental possibilism and Environmental probabilism, Concept of Fit â Adaptibility and flexibility, Anthropometrics and Ergonomics, Barrier free environmental design, Territoriality, Defensible space, Social space â the Westgate theory, Behavioural concepts in Neighbourhood and Urban Design, Speculative aesthetics and symbolic aesthetics, Semantic and Semiotic approaches, Contemporary Sociophysical issues in environmental design.
